Title: Shawshank Redemption
Desc: A man imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit forms a bond with a fellow inmate.

Title: Godfather
Desc: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

Title: Godfather: Part II
Desc: The early life and career of Vito Corleone and his son Michael's rise to power.

Title: Pulp Fiction
Desc: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and others intertwine in four tales of violence.

Title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
Desc: Three gunslingers compete to find a fortune in a buried stash of Confederate gold.

Title: Dark Knight
Desc: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who wants to plunge Gotham into anarchy.

Title: 12 Angry Men
Desc: A jury holds out to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing them to reconsider the evidence.

Title: Schindler's List
Desc: The true story of how businessman Oskar Schindler saved many Jews during WWII.

title: Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Desc: The final confrontation between the forces of good and evil in Middle-earth.

Title: Fight Club
Desc: An insomniac office worker and a soap salesman create an underground fight club.
